problem_text_cn: 如图,△CAB绕点C顺时针旋转34°后得到△CDE,若∠ACE=88°,则∠DCB的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, △CAB rotates clockwise around point C by N_0 to get △CDE, if ∠ACE = N_1, then the degree of ∠DCB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵△CDE是由△CAB绕点C旋转34°得到的∴∠BCE=∠ACD=34°又∵∠ACE=88°∴∠DCB=∠ACE-∠BCE-∠ACD=88°-34°-34°=20°故答案选D.
raw_comment: 本题考查了旋转的性质,角的加减,能根据旋转的性质进行推理是解此题的关键.
